Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.animation.recovery

Interface IAnimatedBlockRecoveryData

All Known Implementing Classes:
IAnimatedBlockRecoveryData.AnimatedBlockRecoveryData, IAnimatedBlockRecoveryData.EmptyRecoveryData
public sealed interface IAnimatedBlockRecoveryData permits IAnimatedBlockRecoveryData.AnimatedBlockRecoveryData, IAnimatedBlockRecoveryData.EmptyRecoveryData
Represents an object that stores recovery data for an animated block.

    • EMPTY

      See Also:

  • Method Details

    • recover

      @CheckReturnValue boolean recover() throws RecoveryFailureException
      Attempts recovery of the animated block display.

      This method gives the animated block the opportunity to recover from a crash or other unexpected event.

      No guarantees are made about the exact behavior of this method, but as long as any kind of recovery action is performed, this method should return true. Only when this method is a no-op should it return false.

      Returns:
      True if a recovery action was performed, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RecoveryFailureException - If something prevented the recovery action from being successful.
